word:
Addie, I observe you listen and watch to hear what others say, thinking they may say something in reference to you. Do not do this anymore. This you should overcome at once. Your mother did in this way when she was a girl, and she fancied that she was slighted and blamed and disliked, and this jealousy grew upon her until after she
197
was married. She made the life of your father anything but pleasant. For your good, I enjoin upon you to nip this in the bud.
